DOC.brief_summary: In study investigator assess tolerance Nebivolol ( Bystolic ) cardiovascular patient able tolerate conventional beta blocker . A side effect profile track compare previous beta blocker use . The investigator hypothesize Bystolic tolerate many patient intolerant conventional blocker .
DOC.brief_title: Alternative Beta Blocker Intolerance : The ABBI Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Patients prescribed standard beta blocker unable tolerate due side effect study . They take new beta blocker , Nebivolol ( Bystolic ) 30 day , tolerate . Side effect track compare previous .
DOC.criteria: Age â‰¥ 21 Male female postmenopausal pregnant use approved contraceptive regimen Previous beta blocker use intolerant beta blocker Systolic blood pressure < 100 mmHg unless another blood pressure medication stop time study entry Hospitalized heart failure within past 4 week Bradycardia heart rate < 60 Heart block great first degree History sick sinus syndrome ( unless permanent pacemaker place ) History severe hepatic renal dysfunction ; serum Creatinine > 2.0 Amylase > 3x normal Use CYP2D6 inhibitor ( quinidine , propafenone , fluoxetine , paroxetine , etc . ) Ingestion investigational drug within past 30 day
